quizzes.question: Who takes longer in the shower?
quizzes.correctResponse: Looks like you both agree on who's the water hog! 💦
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone's lying about their shower time... or maybe they just don’t care about water bills. 🚿

quizzes.question: Who said 'I love you' first?
quizzes.correctResponse: Aww, you both remember it the same way! Love is in the air. ❤️
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s memory is as bad as their commitment skills. 😬

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to forget an anniversary?
quizzes.correctResponse: Oof, you both agree on who's the forgetful one. Better set some reminders! 🗓️
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s denial is stronger than their memory. Good luck with that. 🤷‍♂️

quizzes.question: Who is the better cook?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who rules the kitchen! Bon appétit! 🍳
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s cooking skills are as fake as their confidence. 🔥

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to cry during a movie?
quizzes.correctResponse: Aww, you both know who's the emotional one. Pass the tissues! 🎬
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s trying to act tough, but we all know they cry during commercials. 😭

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to hog the blankets?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the blanket thief! Better invest in separate blankets. 🛌
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s selfishness is showing... and it’s not cute. 🥶

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to plan a surprise date?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the romantic one! Date night incoming! 🌹
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s idea of a date is Netflix and... well, just Netflix. 🍿

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to leave the lights on?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the energy waster! Time to switch to LED bulbs. 💡
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s eco-unfriendly habits are showing. Mother Earth is disappointed. 🌍

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to write a love letter?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the poet in the relationship! 📜
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s love letters are probably just grocery lists. 🛒

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to forget where they parked the car?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the directionally challenged one! 🚗
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s sense of direction is as lost as their keys. 🔑

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to sing in the shower?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the shower superstar! 🎤
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s shower concerts are probably why the neighbors complain. 🎶

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to spend too much money on snacks?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the snack monster! 🍫
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s snack addiction is real... and so is their credit card debt. 💳

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to get lost in a new place?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the navigation nightmare! 🗺️
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s sense of direction is as bad as their excuses. 🧭

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to pick a romantic movie?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the hopeless romantic! 🎥
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s idea of romance is probably a documentary about rocks. 🪨

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to forget to charge their phone?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the battery drainer! 🔋
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s phone is always dead... just like their social life. 📴

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to suggest a spontaneous adventure?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the spontaneous one! Let's go! 🚀
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s idea of adventure is probably rearranging the couch cushions. 🛋️

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to take the last slice of pizza?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the pizza hog! 🍕
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s selfishness is showing... and it’s not a good look. 🍴

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to remember your favorite song?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the music lover! 🎶
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s memory is as bad as their taste in music. 🎧

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to laugh at their own joke?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the comedian! 😂
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s jokes are as funny as a root canal. 🦷

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to dance in public?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the life of the party! 💃
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s dance moves are probably why the party ended early. 🕺

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to wear mismatched socks?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the fashion rebel! 🧦
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s sock game is as bad as their excuses for being late. ⏰

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to make a funny face in photos?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the photo bomber! 📸
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s funny faces are probably why the camera broke. 🤳

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to tell a cheesy joke?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the king/queen of dad jokes! 👑
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s jokes are so bad, even crickets wouldn’t laugh. 🦗

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to start a food fight?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the troublemaker! 🍝
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s idea of fun is probably watching paint dry. 🎨

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to wear pajamas all day?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the cozy one! 🛌
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s pajamas are probably older than their relationship. 🧦

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to talk in their sleep?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the midnight chatterbox! 🌙
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s sleep-talking is probably more interesting than their conversations. 🗣️

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to believe in superstitions?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the superstitious one! 🍀
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s superstitions are probably why they’re single... oh wait. 🪄

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to name their plants?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the plant whisperer! 🌱
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s plants are probably dead... just like their social life. 🪴

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to talk to strangers?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the social butterfly! 🦋
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s social skills are as awkward as a penguin in the desert. 🐧

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to have a secret talent?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the hidden gem! 💎
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s secret talent is probably hiding their lack of talent. 🎭

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to have a favorite childhood toy?
quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the nostalgic one! 🧸
quizzes.falseResponse: Someone’s childhood toy is probably still their best friend. 🪀

quizzes.correctResponse: You both agree on who's the hoarder! 🗂️

quizzes.question: Who is more likely to have a favorite holiday tradition?
